title: I got 326 in the GRE and 3.5 in AWA. Is it bad? - Quora
tags: Graduate School Admission Tests and Exams

response.answer_text: No, your 326 is a great score. AWA isn't the strongest, but to be very honest, they don't consider it a LOT. You can easily get into a good uni depending on other things like what programs you wanna get into or your GPA or work experience, etc. As I have read here, “A good score doesn't guarantee you an admission, but bad score costs you one for sure”
